import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Container, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import Base from "../components/Base"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const Signup = () => { const [data,setData]=useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', about:'' }) const[error,setError]=useState({ errors:{}, isError:false }) useEffect(()=>{ console.log(data); },[data]) //dynamic setting the property const handleChange=(event,property)=>{ setData({...data,[property]:event.target.value}) } const reset = ()=>{ data.event.reset } return (
